Title: The Magician
Plot: Bechhi is accused of being a spy for Rome. The armies of Rome and Florence face off, and Leonardo reveals his latest weapon.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence, nudity, sex scenes & offensive language
GuestStars: Ted Allpress, Iain Mitchell, Jack Farthing, David Blackwell, Wyn Bowen Jones, Jack Baggs, James Peake, Andrew Brooke, Gareth Milton, Ross O'Hennessey, Ian Pirie, Simon Armstrong, Joe Claflin, John Cording, Tim Fara
